attributes.action: Issus a vetrans Medal that can be worn with Cadet Forces Unifom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
is it only me that find the issues around a issue of a veterans badge i bit of a fudge

I have been issued my Veterans badge which I wear on my civi’s, Having served in the RAF in the late 70's early 80’s .
like many service men at the time  was not posted any where that would have earned me The GSM or other campaign Medal.

Currently I am an adult instructor in the sea cadet corps,
Something that ive noticed seems odd, I can not were my Veterans Badge on my uniform, also can not wear any Commemorative Medals, to show service to the crown,for which im proud to have done .
While in turn had I stayed in the cadets and not gone in the forces, I could wear the cadet forces medal, having not served a day’s full time. I think this is wrong  not wishing to take anything away from the cadet medal

So why do the government  


a] Bring out a Veterans Medal


b] ALLOW Commemorative Medals, (not on the same bar as issued medals) to be worn on no1 dress
